mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.* from ( select camp.camp_no as campNo, camp_name as campName, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg, campenv.env_name as campEnv, (select min(room_price) from camproom where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campMinPrice, (select round(avg(rev_star),1) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar, (select camp_filepath from file_tbl where file_no = (select min(file_no) from file_tbl where camp_no = camp.camp_no)) as imgpath from camp full join campenv on (camp.camp_no = campenv.camp_no) )c) where rnum between ${start} and ${end}
select file_no as fileNo, camp_no as campNo, camp_filename as campFileName, camp_filepath as campFilePath from file_tbl where camp_no = #{_parameter}

select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg, (select round(avg(rev_star),1) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar from camp where camp_no = #{campNo}

select count(*)
from camp where camp_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
from camp where camp_addr like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select camp.camp_no as campNo, camp_name as campName, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg, campenv.env_name as campEnv, (select min(room_price) from camproom where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campMinPrice, (select round(avg(rev_star),1) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar, (select camp_filepath from file_tbl where file_no = (select min(file_no) from file_tbl where camp_no = camp.camp_no)) as imgpath from camp full join campenv on (camp.camp_no = campenv.camp_no) order by camp.camp_no desc

select camp.camp_no as campNo, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, campenv.env_name as campEnv, (select min(room_price) from camproom where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campMinPrice, (select round(avg(rev_star),1) from review where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as campStar, (select sum(res_count) from reservation where camp_no = camp.camp_no) as resCount, (select camp_filepath from file_tbl where file_no = (select min(file_no) from file_tbl where camp_no = camp.camp_no)) as imgpath from camp full join campenv on (camp.camp_no = campenv.camp_no) order by resCount

select camp_notice_no as campNoticeNo, camp_no as campNo, camp_notice_title as campNoticeTitle, camp_notice_contents as campNoticeContents, camp_notice_filepath as campNoticefilePath, camp_notice_filename as campNoticeFilename, camp_notice_date as campNoticeDate from camp_notice where camp_no=#{campNo} order by camp_notice_no desc

select rev_no as revNo, user_id as userId, camp_no as campNo, rev_contents as revContents, rev_star as revStar, rev_date as revDate, rev_image as revImage, rev_heart as revHeart from review where camp_no=#{campNo} order by rev_no desc
select room_no as roomNo, camp_no as campNo, room_member as roomMember, room_name as roomName, room_price as roomPrice from camproom where camp_no=#{_parameter}
